column3: Since this helps review, might as well add the `GUARDED_BY` annotation to prevent further patches that touch the same line.

Sorry @practicalswift, it's a NACK. At the moment `m_last_block_processed` is guarded by `cs_main`. See\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/85123be78df5a4e9447e70f9ee727416d45843d7/src/wallet/wallet.cpp#L1280-L1282
